verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:18
verses.text: For first of all, when ye come together in the church, I hear that there be divisions among you; and I partly believe it.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:19
verses.text: For there must be also heresies among you, that they which are approved may be made manifest among you.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:20
verses.text: When ye come together therefore into one place, this is not to eat the Lord’s supper.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:21
verses.text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper: and one is hungry, and another is drunken.
